definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: “那真是個慈善家，”艾倫猛然說道。

sentences.english: Dr Tam is a well-known industrialist and philanthropist.
sentences.chinese: 譚華正博士爲著名工業家及慈善家。

sentences.english: He became a yellow smiley-based philanthropist.
sentences.chinese: 他成了黃色笑臉的慈善家。

sentences.english: Mr. Shzo Yifu was a great philanthropist.
sentences.chinese: 邵逸夫先生是一個大慈善家。
沒有一位慈善家是孤立的。

sentences.english: The notion of the Citizen Philanthropist (CP) is not new.
sentences.chinese: 平民慈善家這個概念並不新鮮。

sentences.english: Increasingly, philanthropists and foundations are recognizing the benefits of the flexible approach.
sentences.chinese: 慈善家與基金會也逐漸瞭解到靈活融資方式的好處。

sentences.english: Zhu Baosan was a celebrated industrialist and philanthropist during the late Qing Dynasty and early Republican period.
sentences.chinese: 朱葆三是清末民初著名實業慈善家。

sentences.english: Yet the crisis has taken its toll on London's hedge-fund philanthropists.
sentences.chinese: 但是倫敦的對沖基金慈善家們已經因爲危機受到打擊。

sentences.english: But Lissoos is an entrepreneur, not just a philanthropist.
sentences.chinese: 但利索斯是企業家，而不只是慈善家。

sentences.english: Dr Li, a successful entrepreneur and highly respected philanthropist, is Chairman of Roxy Property Investment Co.
sentences.chinese: 李博士是成功的企業家，也是備受尊崇的慈善家。

sentences.english: Tin Ka-ping is one of Hong Kong's best-known industrialists and philanthropists.
sentences.chinese: 田家炳是香港最有名的實業家和慈善家之一。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility
